title: My account has been completely reset!
body:
I was in the middle of a ranked game, just died to rumble ult as pantheon and then my league black screened. 
when i tried to load it back up its applying an update i cant return to my game. 
plus its saying im a level 1 player with no champions/skins or rp/ip 
I submitted a ticket already

I am beyond furious

edit: currently deleting and reinstalling....
